title: How many potatoes are needed to grow 100 kg of potatoes? - Quora

response.answer_text: The maximum profit of cultivating potatoes is 11.5 kilo per m2. You can calculate how great the surface of the ground is you need. The distance of how much potatoes you use per m2 varies. For instance, early cultivars are 5 per m2. Late varieties are less than 5 per m2. Do you calculations…
